    Matheus Hostert

    Postdoctoral researcher at the Perimeter Institute and University of Minnesota.

    Projects

    DarkNews-generator

    A lightweight generator for beyond-the-Standard-Model processes in neutrino-nucleus scattering. DarkNews is listed on PyPI and is available for Python 3.7+. For more information, visit the Github page and the accompanying publication on arXiv.

    Heavy Neutrino Limits

    A database of limits on heavy neutrinos. A complete description can be found on Github.

    Inspy-HEP

    A Python interface to the Inspire-HEP API. Access your metrics and print publication and collaborator lists.
